arca.ste.emm package

Submodules

arca.ste.emm.emm module

class EMM

Bases: arca.ste.eds.EDS[arca.ste.emm.emm.KeyType, arca.ste.emm.multimap.Multimap[arca.ste.emm.emm.MMKeyType, arca.ste.emm.emm.MMValueType], arca.ste.emm.emm.EdsType, arca.ste.emm.emm.MMKeyType, List[arca.ste.emm.emm.MMValueType]], Generic[arca.ste.emm.emm.KeyType, arca.ste.emm.emm.EdsType, arca.ste.emm.emm.MMKeyType, arca.ste.emm.emm.MMValueType]

An interface representing an encrypted multimap scheme.

abstract generate_key() → arca.ste.emm.emm.KeyType

Generates a key for the encrypted multimap scheme.

Returns

a key

abstract encrypt(key: arca.ste.emm.emm.KeyType, plaintext_mm: Multimap[arca.ste.emm.emm.MMKeyType, arca.ste.emm.emm.MMValueType]) → bytes

Encrypts the given plaintext multimap with the given key and returns a byte string representing the encrypted multimap.

Parameters

  • key¶ – the key to encrypt with, as generated from generate_key()

  • plaintext_mm¶ – the plaintext Multimap to encrypt

Returns

a serialized encrypted multimap

abstract load_eds(eds_bytes: bytes) → arca.ste.emm.emm.EdsType

Deserializes a byte string representing an encrypted multimap into the type needed by the query() algorithm.

Parameters

eds_bytes¶ – a serialized encrypted multimap from encrypt()

Returns

a deserialized version of the encrypted multimap

abstract token(key: arca.ste.emm.emm.KeyType, keyword: arca.ste.emm.emm.MMKeyType) → bytes

Generates a search token for the given key and keyword.

Parameters

  • key¶ – the key to encrypt with

  • keyword¶ – the keyword to query the encrypted multimap with

Returns

a search token

abstract query(token: bytes, eds: arca.ste.emm.emm.EdsType) → Optional[bytes]

Returns a result for the given search token queried over the given encrypted multimap.

Parameters

  • token¶ – a search token generated by token()

  • eds¶ – the encrypted data structure from load_eds()

Returns

a serialized response to pass to resolve()

abstract resolve(key: arca.ste.emm.emm.KeyType, response: bytes) → List[arca.ste.emm.emm.MMValueType]

Resolves the serialized response returned by the server into a native List[MMValueType].

If the encrypted multimap is response-hiding, the given key is also used to decrypt the response.

Parameters

  • key¶ – the key to decrypt with

  • response¶ – the serialized response from query()

Returns

a list of plaintext values

arca.ste.emm.multimap module

class Multimap(multimap: typing.Dict[arca.ste.emm.multimap.KeyType, typing.List[arca.ste.emm.multimap.ValueType]] = <factory>)

Bases: Generic[arca.ste.emm.multimap.KeyType, arca.ste.emm.multimap.ValueType]

A multimap.

The internal representation of Multimap uses lists, so duplicate entries for the same key are permitted.

multimap: Dict[arca.ste.emm.multimap.KeyType, List[arca.ste.emm.multimap.ValueType]]
set(key: arca.ste.emm.multimap.KeyType, element: arca.ste.emm.multimap.ValueType) → None

Adds the given (key, element) pair to the Multimap.

Parameters

  • key¶ – the key to associate the element with

  • element¶ – the element to add to the Multimap

Returns

None

get(key: arca.ste.emm.multimap.KeyType) → Optional[List[arca.ste.emm.multimap.ValueType]]

Retrieves all of the elements associated with the given key in the Multimap.

Parameters

key¶ – the key to retrieve

Returns

A List of all of the elements associated with the key in the Multimap, or None if no elements are associated with the given key.

delete(key: arca.ste.emm.multimap.KeyType) → None

Deletes all of the elements associated with the given key in the Multimap.

Parameters

key¶ – the key to delete

Returns

None

arca.ste.emm.pi_2lev_emm module

class Pi2LevEMM(key_length: int = 16)

Bases: arca.ste.emm.emm.EMM[bytes, Dict[bytes, bytes], arca.ste.emm.pi_2lev_emm.MMKeyType, arca.ste.emm.pi_2lev_emm.MMValueType]

Implements the Pi_2lev scheme from [CJJJKRS14].

Pi_2lev achieves more reasonable tradeoffs between index size and search time than Pi_bas by storing each set of records matching a keyword differently according to the size of the set.

generate_key() → bytes

Generates a key for the encrypted multimap scheme.

Returns

a key

encrypt(key: bytes, plaintext_mm: Multimap[arca.ste.emm.pi_2lev_emm.MMKeyType, arca.ste.emm.pi_2lev_emm.MMValueType]) → bytes

Encrypts the given plaintext multimap with the given key and returns a byte string representing the encrypted multimap.

Parameters

  • key¶ – the key to encrypt with, as generated from generate_key()

  • plaintext_mm¶ – the plaintext Multimap to encrypt

Returns

a serialized encrypted multimap

load_eds(eds_bytes: bytes) → Dict[bytes, bytes]

Deserializes a byte string representing an encrypted multimap into the type needed by the query() algorithm.

Parameters

eds_bytes¶ – a serialized encrypted multimap from encrypt()

Returns

a deserialized version of the encrypted multimap

token(key: bytes, keyword: arca.ste.emm.pi_2lev_emm.MMKeyType) → bytes

Generates a search token for the given key and keyword.

Parameters

  • key¶ – the key to encrypt with

  • keyword¶ – the keyword to query the encrypted multimap with

Returns

a search token

query(token: bytes, eds: Dict[bytes, bytes]) → bytes

Returns a result for the given search token queried over the given encrypted multimap.

Parameters

  • token¶ – a search token generated by token()

  • eds¶ – the encrypted data structure from load_eds()

Returns

a serialized response to pass to resolve()

resolve(key: bytes, response: bytes) → List[arca.ste.emm.pi_2lev_emm.MMValueType]

Resolves the serialized response returned by the server into a native List[MMValueType].

If the encrypted multimap is response-hiding, the given key is also used to decrypt the response.

Parameters

  • key¶ – the key to decrypt with

  • response¶ – the serialized response from query()

Returns

a list of plaintext values

arca.ste.emm.pi_base_emm module

class PiBaseEMMKeyPurpose(value)

Bases: enum.IntEnum

Internal class denoting the purpose of a key; used to consistently derive the same key in operations.

HMAC = 0

Purpose for a key used for HMAC operations.

ENCRYPT = 1

Purpose for a key used for encryption operations.

class PiBaseEMM(*, mm_key_serializer: arca.ste.serializers.serializer.Serializer[arca.ste.emm.pi_base_emm.MMKeyType] = <arca.ste.serializers.pickle_serializer.PickleSerializer object>, mm_value_serializer: arca.ste.serializers.serializer.Serializer[arca.ste.emm.pi_base_emm.MMValueType] = <arca.ste.serializers.pickle_serializer.PickleSerializer object>, encryption_scheme: arca.ste.symmetric_encryption.symmetric_encryption_scheme.SymmetricEncryptionScheme = <arca.ste.symmetric_encryption.simple_symmetric_encryption_scheme.SimpleSymmetricEncryptionScheme object>, hashing_scheme: arca.ste.hash_functions.hash_function_scheme.HashFunctionScheme = <arca.ste.hash_functions.simple_hash_function_scheme.SimpleHashFunctionScheme object>, key_length: int = 16)

Bases: arca.ste.emm.emm.EMM[bytes, Dict[bytes, bytes], arca.ste.emm.pi_base_emm.MMKeyType, arca.ste.emm.pi_base_emm.MMValueType], Generic[arca.ste.emm.pi_base_emm.MMKeyType, arca.ste.emm.pi_base_emm.MMValueType]

Implements the Pi_bas scheme from [CJJJKRS14].

encryption_scheme: SymmetricEncryptionScheme

The internal representation of Multimap uses lists, so duplicate entries for the same key are permitted.

Implements the Pi_2lev scheme from [CJJJKRS14].

Pi_2lev achieves more reasonable tradeoffs between index size and search time than Pi_bas by storing each set of records matching a keyword differently according to the size of the set.
